lead_paragraph: Steve Sax, nearing the end of his baseball career, is getting ready for a new game -- politics. Sax, a Republican, will run for the California Assembly in 1996. "In the last few days I decided to make a decision and go ahead with it," Sax said today. "There's real strong support from the people in the area."
